0.Description: Monopoly, real-estate board game for two to eight players, in which the player's goal is to remain financially solvent while forcing opponents into bankruptcy by buying and developing pieces of property.

1.Description: Cards Against Humanity is a party game for horrible people. Unlike most of the party games you've played before, Cards Against Humanity is as despicable and awkward as you and your friends.

2.Name: Exploding Kittens
2.Description: Exploding Kittens is a highly strategic kitty-powered version of Russian Roulette.

3.Name: Catan
3.Description: In Catan, players are recent immigrants to the newly populated island of Catan.
